data.text:
A lovely stay! Really helpful staff, Roxanne was super helpful and made us feel very comfortable. Free coffee in the morning was such a treat. A great stay for a few hours between flights!

We stayed in a 2 bed bunk, worth making use of the earplugs as it is quiet but you can still hear a little bit going on outside.
data.title: Great stay, thanks Roxanne!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Anouska Jarritt,

Thank you for your kind words and feedback about your recent stay at our sleep lounge. We are delighted to hear that Roxanne and the rest of our team were able to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. We strive to provide excellent service to all of our guests and it is always rewarding to hear when we have succeeded.

We appreciate your feedback about the noise level in the Bunk Cabin and will certainly consider that for future improvements. We are glad that you were able to make use of the earplugs provided and still enjoy your stay with us.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and we hope to welcome you back in the future.

Best regards,

The Lounge Team
owner_response.author: Rebecca S

data.text: When I have long hours of layover in Dubai Airport, I always choose to stay here in Sleep 'n fly.  I have previously tried the FlexiSuite, Igloo Pod (near Gate A i think), and the Lounge Lite.  However, for this day I only had less than 5 hours of layover.  I was not feeling comfortable about the clothes I was wearing. So I chose to only have a quick shower and change my clothes.  They do have that option where you can have a shower with shampoo, body wash, and body lotion.  The shower was great it comes with hot and cold water. They also have hair blower, towels and a changing area.  Although, I slipped upon entering the shower room the floor was slippery.  I fell upon my hip.  I was okay that day but I felt the pain on the following days.  Anyway, I told the staff that they need to put anti-slip mat or tape at the shower area.  It will prevent slipping incident.  In the future, I will still go here and have a shower given that they provide anti-slip mat :)  I still like this place that's why I'm giving it a 5-star.  They have accommodating staffs, clean area, and it comes with free drinks (coffee, chocolates, soda).
data.title: Anti-slip mat/tape in Shower room please

user_location.name: Trieste, Province of Trieste, Friuli Venezia Giulia

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Passport67728192496,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us at sleep 'n fly in Dubai Airport. We truly appreciate your feedback and are glad to hear that you have enjoyed our facilities in the past.

We are sorry to hear about the slip incident you experienced during your recent visit. Your safety and comfort are our top priorities, and we will take your suggestion of adding anti-slip mats or tape in the shower area into consideration to prevent such incidents in the future.

We are glad to hear that you still like our place and that you will continue to visit us. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and hope that you are feeling better after the fall.

Thank you once again for your feedback and for choosing sleep 'n fly. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Best regards,

The Lounge Team
owner_response.author: Rebecca S

data.text:
I hadn’t previously experienced a capsule / pod hotel but with no expectations, Sleep n’ Fly has converted me, at least for in-transit accommodation when you cannot or do not want to camp in an airport lounge. 

Six, eight and ten hour stays with extension options available from what I recall.

Easy check in and out, smart styling and design functionality, the facility has all round great contemporary look and experience.

Comfortable chairs, with desk pull-outs, turn into comfortable beds, with above head suitcase storage. In-pod USB device charging. I slept for four hours and worked for two in my pod during my six hour stay, but I could have chosen to relax or work in the well-designed common lounge area.

Washrooms are separate, as are showers. 

Bonus: great coffee maker, plus teas, water and soft drinks are on tap and inclusive.

Super staff.

Made all the difference to my transit experience and I did not feel I was being ripped off.
data.title: A great surprise!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear PennyMilnerSmyth,

Thank you very much for your very positive evaluation.

We are happy to know that you enjoyed our service. Your feedback is very helpful for travelers’ having layovers at Dubai International Airport.

We look forward to welcoming you again soon and sharing a better experience.

Best regards,

The Lounge Team
owner_response.author: Rebecca S

data.text: Sorry this may work for many travellers. But I don't think this place is value for the money spent. I understand it is pod and a 4 sqm space just big enough for a bunk. The aircon is preset and felt much warmer than what was displayed. I not only found the space uncomfortable but stuffy and felt like the pod wasn't cleaned or sanitised properly prior to the next set of guests arriving. The staff weren't  friendly either and not welcoming. Wasn't a good experience and instead rather used the opportunity to sit in the business lounge. For the rest of time while in transit. Definitely a no no for me.
data.title: Not impressed not worth the money spent

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Doggobone01,

I would like to apologize for having given you the cause to write on this occasion. 

We appreciate your review and for bringing to our attention the factors that have impacted your overall experience during your stay with us. Our service team has been notified of all the issues and they are currently working on resolving them.

Apologies once again - please do come and visit us and I am sure we will be able to restore your confidence in our business.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Rebecca S

data.text:
Wonderful place to stay during my layover.  Comfortable, private, clean, good coffee, and cheap.  I really appreciated having a locking door, where I could safely leave my luggage so I could walk around the airport, get something to eat, and use the restroom without having to keep all my stuff with me.
I wish this was at every airport!
data.title: Great place for a layover!
